title: A Broken Leg for Bonk
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 177 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 330L, Fiction Series
description: Bonk and Lurk are at the playground. Lurk pushes Bonk very high on the swing. Everything is fine until Bonk's hands slip and he falls to the ground, breaking his leg. Now Lurk must help Bonk until he recovers. Find out how Lurk feels about helping Bonk. Pictures support the text.
